
---
title: "GetImage"
title_tag: "Function GetImage | Module ecr | Package AWS"
meta_desc: "Explore the GetImage function of the ecr module, including examples, input properties, output properties, and supporting types. The ECR Image data source allows the details of an image with a particular tag or digest to be retrieved."
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

The ECR Image data source allows the details of an image with a particular tag or digest to be retrieved.

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const serviceImage = pulumi.output(aws.ecr.getImage({
    imageTag: "latest",
    repositoryName: "my/service",
}, { async: true }));
```

{{% /example %}}
{{% /examples %}}

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Image<wbr>Digest</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The sha256 digest of the image manifest. At least one of `image_digest` or `image_tag` must be specified.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Image<wbr>Tag</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd>
